texts: Your application can take up to 10 working days to be processed. We'll email you when your service is ready to use - at that point you can add your vehicles to Fleet Auto Pay.
To help you manage the day-to-day administration of your Fleet Auto Pay service, you can allow up to 5 people access to your London Road User Charging account.
You can add up to 5 other users to help manage your Fleet Auto Pay service. Once your application is processed you can enter their details in your account settings.
